title.rendered: Go For Gold With Handshake and You Can Win Prizes

content.rendered:
As Olympians around the world prepare to bring their A-game in Tokyo, they’re pushing their bodies and minds to the limit for a chance to win medals in their sport of choice. And while not every job requires thousands of hours in the gym each year, we can all benefit from training hard to do our best in our career path! That’s why Handshake is kicking off Go For Gold, a weekly training series to help set you up for success as you race toward your job or internship. 

A message from Olympic gold medalist Gabby Douglas

How to #GoForGold

Starting today, visit joinhandshake.com/gfg to take simple weekly actions that’ll help you vault into an amazing career, and you’ll automatically be entered to win gold, silver, or bronze-level prizes. Here’s a quick overview of each week’s actions, but be sure to visit our dedicated website for the full details and giveaway rules:

Week 1 (July 19-25, 2021)

  • Follow Handshake on Instagram

Week 2 (July 26 – August 1, 2021)

  • Download the Handshake mobile app (or save a job in the app if you have it already)

Week 3 (August 2-8, 2021)

  • Update your job interests, cities, or roles on your Handshake profile

Week 4 (August 9-15, 2021)

  • Upload a resume 

Visit here for full details as you prepare to go for gold this summer! 

Photo by Anthony from Pexels

excerpt.rendered: Consider this weekly challenge an Olympic training camp for your career.
